messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telecommunication failu*3mga;b4;'1vï¿½-BZZZT

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The bartender was a sinner sinners will be purged

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The Hop is now acting captain -ce

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Counter Intelligence

Cargo: The syndicate are trying to infiltrate your station. If you let them hijack your cargo shuttle, you'll save us a headache.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Detective's Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in five minutes. Have some supply points for your trouble.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Suit sensors full, also, the cook is dead

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: I think comms is down xd

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Cargo Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Telecomms Server Room.
